Akron.Goodyear Polymer Center: The Goodyear Polymer Center (commonly referred to as "the polymer building") is a 146,000 sq. ft. research facility, located at the University of Akron, in Akron, Ohio. It consists of 12-story and 9-story towers connected by glass-enclosed walkways that serve as areas for informal interaction. It is the 8th tallest building in Akron.
